Description:
-------------
Bring the popular RC hobby on your TV screen with MiniCopter: Adventure Flight on the Wii in the spring of 2008. Using the exclusive control features of the Wii, gamers Have Their full control over MiniCopter - choose from the Wii Remote tilt, pointer controls or play with a Classic Controller! Engage in 42 missions in 7 Different Environments from a child's bedroom, hospital, hotel room and more!
